Questions: What is the meaning of ‘escaping to PHP’?

Questions: What is the use of the __toString() method in PHP?

Questions: What is the use of the __set() method in PHP?

Questions: What is the use of the __get() method in PHP?

Questions: What is the use of the __call() method in PHP?

Questions: What is the use of the __clone() method in PHP?
